name: Symmetric Sprite Editor Part2Art.com
short_description:
Please, leave comments at https://www.facebook.com/part2art

Part2art.com is back online. Please be aware that the Flash/AS3 version 25b(?) is extremely outdated. Part2art.com uses Construct 2 and PHP now. I would be happy to release all the code if Xavier4321 on opengameart.org approves of it:  http://opengameart.org/comment/28647#comment-28647

There is no offline version with the same capabilities of part2art.com. There is a watered down iPad version that has the red set of parts. "PartArt: Space" I believe.

Two known bugs: right clicking on save/download causes the saved image to contain the UI. Left clicking is fine.
Altering packs (positions, deleting) is also buggy, but that mostly applies to the users that can alter packs.
summary: Create symmetric sprites: browse, save to PC, or store online
